attributes.additional_details:
Mainly driven towards the borough of Greenwich, this petition has an aim to construct a homeless shelter in the Greenwich borough. Research shows that there are no homeless shelters in the southern part of London and homelessness is an increasing problem that needs to be dealt with.

We have recently contacted the local MP for Greenwich and Woolwich, Nick Raynsford, and he had indicated that there is a gap in this sector and he notified that if we gather sufficient signatures he will concider dedicating land to a shelter being build in the Greenwich borough
